channel.title: Client JAG GRAB Connect Problem
channel.description:
Hey people. Few of you probably tried my Music and Sound client :P But many people are having this problem and I have it gotten it once in a while. On launching the client, even though I have modified Sprite.java (This is a refactored client) to load the title screen from a different image file, once in a blue moon the client will try to Jag-Grab the title screen, and gets stuck on Requesting Title Screen for a while, then an Exception is thrown.
I had the client print out the file that was trying to be grabbed, and finally got the client to try and grab the file. It trys to grab the file "title0".
Link to the client (Click a World): [url=http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/worldselect/]http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/worldselect/[/url]
Heres a screenshot: [img]http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/pics/jag_grab.jpg[/img]
Any idea how to stop the client from grabbing the file, though I don't know what causes it to try because this doesn't happen all the time. :eek:

item.title: Client JAG GRAB Connect Problem
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Hey people. Few of you probably tried my Music and Sound client
But many people are having this problem and I have it gotten it once in a while. On launching the client, even though I have modified Sprite.java (This is a refactored client) to load the title screen from a different image file, once in a blue moon the client will try to Jag-Grab the title screen, and gets stuck on Requesting Title Screen for a while, then an Exception is thrown.

I had the client print out the file that was trying to be grabbed, and finally got the client to try and grab the file. It trys to grab the file “title0”.

Link to the client (Click a World): http://allgofree.redirectme.net/rs/worldselect/

Heres a screenshot:

Any idea how to stop the client from grabbing the file, though I don’t know what causes it to try because this doesn’t happen all the time. :eek:
